attributes.action: Stop making false accusations about "reducing living costs" when everyone is struggling and it's NOT getting any easier
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am 15 almost 16 and I've noticed That Every election we put up with people saying "lower taxes" and we will do this and that yet NOTHING ever changes every year the average family has to cope with RISING concil tax on top on VAT Road Tax MOTs etc etc and then the money we ARE entitled to we DON'T get or are arguments are made for WHY we can't have what we ARE entitled to!
